name: Unity3D Demo Project - Joystick, Enemy Spawn, Scoring
name_original: Unity3D Demo Project - Joystick, Enemy Spawn, Scoring
description: This is a simple demo for Unity beginners looking to implement JOYSTICKS, spawning ENEMIES and awarding POINTS to player. This project combines with my video 'Spacefarer Devlog 1', otherwise this upload looks a bit random haha
